name: Enabling Emergent Behavior in Fully Onchain Games
description: From Warcraft3 to Skyrim to Minecraft, engaged creator communities have proven themselves a powerful catalyst for emergent behavior. Yet as games become more fully onchain, participating in world building becomes more technical and challenging. What have we learned about these challenges, and what is necessary to enable emergent behavior in fully onchain games?

speakers.name: Gabe Rudich
speakers.bio: Gabe works at Cartridge, focusing on creating tooling and infrastructure for building fully onchain games.
